message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's better to settle now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I think we can both do better. Let's split the money 60/40 in my favor. Inflation will hit you harder than me, so this is a fair deal for both of us.

Bob, I understand the impact of inflation is different for us, but your offer was too far in your favor. Let's be reasonable: I'll take $55, you take $45.  We need to settle this before the money shrinks even more.
